comments:
I20050509-1200, GTK+ 2.6.4, KDE 3.3.2, X.org 6.8.2, Linux 2.6.11

I had a list of incoming updates in the synchronize view, and then clicking on
the "Change Sets" tool bar item to display them grouped by commit.  While the
tree was being populated, I clicked on the topmost item.  This led to five
exceptions (with error dialogs) in rapid succession.
